thread.section_title: VON FLOERKE Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von VON FLOERKE | vonfloerke.com
thread.title: Marlen Schiche
thread.title_full: VON FLOERKE bewertet von Marlen Schiche

author: Marlen Schiche
title: Marlen Schiche
text:
I bought four products so far: two watches and two ties. Since I (woman) am mainly wearing the watch, I will focus on how i loved the leather brace, as well as the simple but beautiful design of the display. It is one of my favorite watches of all times. The delivery was rapid and just on time for christmas, so that I could give away the ties to the male family members. The packaging looked really high-end, even though I did not even order gift wrapping.
I can only recommend using the online shop for good deals on beautiful products with quick delivery.
